script:
1). What did Mark say about working on Saturday?
She says she will be there.
Mark is talking on the phone.
He said he won't be available. 
2). Do you prefer lobster or crab?
Neither, actually. 
I really love seafood.
I did like the lobster.
3). Does Simon Smith work here?
He used to. 
No, he didn't.
Yes, I do.
